statements: DELETE FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level >= 2.0 AND potassium_level <= 1.5;
DELETE FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE Location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM CropDetails WHERE CropName = 'Corn' AND RecommendedNitrogen = 50;
DELETE FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE Location = 'Farm A';
DELETE FROM Fertilizers WHERE fertilizer_name = 'Organic Fertilizer'
DELETE FROM Fertilizers WHERE potassium_content > 0.5 AND phosphorus_content < 0.1;
DELETE FROM FieldTests WHERE nitrogen_application >= 50 AND potassium_application <= 20;
